text.text: Psittacosaurus, a little ceratopsian from China, Mongolia, Siberia, and Thailand. This smart little ceratopsian, from calculations, had a rather large brain-to-body ratio and would've been active during the night and day. Psittacosaurus also had a rather well developed sense of smell and vision.
Psittacosaurus was almost 2 meters in length, with hatchlings found as small as 13 centimeters.
